revision.text: ==Japanese== ===Romanization=== {{ja-romaji}} # {{ja-romanization of|やみ}} ---- ==Pukapukan== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|pkp|poz-pol-pro|*masi}} by [[w:Metathesis (linguistics)|metathesis]], either from {{inh|pkp|poz-pro|*(ma-)qasin|gloss=salty}} or {{l|poz-pro|*maŋsit|gloss=stench}}. ===Noun=== {{head|pkp|noun}} # dish made from decayed coconut # [[food]] #: ''Na tangi te tamá ki tona matua ki tana '''yami'''.'' #:: That child cried to his parent for some '''food'''. #: {{syn|pkp|kai|popoa}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|pkp|yamiyami|gloss=something to eat}} ===Further reading=== * [http://pukapuka.world/dictionary/ Te Pukamuna | Pukapuka Dictionary]
